00040 // Executable gnuplot. NOTE: use pgnuplot instead of wgnuplot in Windows, otherwise
00041 // the pipe will not work.

00049 // File local defines
00051 #define HDR_STR                         " HDR              - GEO  : %08x CRATE         : %08x CH COUNT : %08x \n"
00052 #define DATUM_STR                       "  DATUM           - GEO  : %08x CHANNEL       : %08x ADC      : %08x UN : %08x OV : %08x \n"
00053 #define NOT_VALID_DATUM_STR     "  NOT VALID DATUM - \n"
00054 #define EOB_STR                         " EOB              - GEO  : %08x EVENT COUNTER : %08x \n"
00055 #define UNKNOWN_STR                     "\n??? UNKNOWN TAG ??? -          READ WORD     : %08x \n\n"

00058 #define MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS      MAX_THRESHOLD_NUM

00079 
00080 static int channel_select( int act_channel) {
00081     char new_ch_string[10];
00082     // Clear line
00083     printf( "\r                                                                        ");
00084     printf( "\rInsert the new channel value [0..%d] (actual: %d) : ", MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS- 1, act_channel);
00085     if ( getstring( new_ch_string, 3)) {
00086         act_channel= atoi( new_ch_string);
00087         if ( act_channel< 0) {
00088             act_channel= 0;
00089         } else if ( act_channel> MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS- 1) {
00090             act_channel= MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS- 1;
00091         }
00092     }
00093     // Clear line
00094     printf( "\r                                                                        ");
00095     // restore position
00096     printf( "\r");
00097     return act_channel;
00098 }
00099 
00101 
00106 
00107 long get_time()
00108 {
00109         static long startup= 0;
00110         long time_ms;
00111 
00112 #ifdef WIN32
00113         struct _timeb timebuffer;
00114 
00115         _ftime( &timebuffer );
00116         if( !startup) {
00117                 startup= (long)timebuffer.time;
00118         }
00119         time_ms = (long)( timebuffer.time- startup) * 1000 + (long)timebuffer.millitm;
00120 #else
00121         struct timeval t1;
00122         struct timezone tz;
00123 
00124         gettimeofday(&t1, &tz);
00125         if( !startup) {
00126                 startup= (long)t1.tv_sec;
00127         }
00128         time_ms = (t1.tv_sec- startup) * 1000 + t1.tv_usec / 1000;
00129 #endif
00130 
00131         return time_ms;
00132 }

00147 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00148 
00149 {
00150     int ret_val= 0;                                                                     // procedure exit value
00151     cvt_V792_data board_data;                                           // board data
00152     user_setting_data user_setting;                                     // user settings
00153     FILE* parsed_out_file= NULL;                                        // parsed output file
00154     FILE* raw_out_file= NULL;                                           // raw output file
00155     UINT8 *data_buff= NULL;                                                     // read data buffer
00156     UINT32 data_size;
00157     int32_t vme_handle= -1;                                                     // The CAENVMELib handle
00158     long read_events= 0;
00159     const int DATA_BUFF_SIZE= 1024*1024;                        // The data buffer size
00160     BOOL paused= FALSE;
00161     unsigned long *histo_buff[ MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS];     // Histogram data buffer
00162     FILE* gnu_plot_pipe= NULL;                                          // gnu_plot pipe
00163     long next_refresh= 0;
00164     char aux_string[ 100];
00165     int act_channel= 0;
00166 
00167 
00169     // Demo application specific
00171 
00172     memset( &user_setting, 0, sizeof( user_setting));
00173     memset( &board_data, 0, sizeof( board_data));
00174     memset( histo_buff, 0, MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS* sizeof( histo_buff[0]));
00175 
00176 
00177     //
00178     // print header
00179     printf( "\n");
00180     printf( "-------------------------------------------------------\n");
00181     printf( "-              C A E N   Q T P    D E M O             -\n");
00182     printf( "-                                                     -\n");
00183     printf( "-   www.caen.it                             rev.01.02 -\n");
00184     printf( "-------------------------------------------------------\n");
00185     printf( "\n");
00186 
00187     //
00188     // init user setting module
00189     if ( !user_settings_open( &user_setting)) {
00190         ret_val= -1;
00191         goto exit_point;
00192     }
00193 
00194     //
00195     // input parameter check
00196     if ( !user_settings_parse_input_param( &user_setting, argc, (char**)argv)) {
00197         ret_val= -2;
00198         goto exit_point;
00199     }
00200     //
00201     // Vme handle initialization
00202     while ( TRUE) {
00203                 if ( CAENVME_Init( cvV1718, user_setting.m_link_number, user_setting.m_board_number, &vme_handle)== cvSuccess) {
00204             user_setting.m_board_type= cvV1718;
00205             break;
00206         }
00207         if ( CAENVME_Init( cvV2718, user_setting.m_link_number, user_setting.m_board_number, &vme_handle)== cvSuccess) {
00208             user_setting.m_board_type= cvV2718;
00209             break;
00210         }
00211         TRACE("VME INIT ERROR :  press 'Q' to quit or any other key to retry\n");
00212         if ( toupper( getch()) == 'Q') {
00213             ret_val= -3;
00214             goto exit_point;
00215         }
00216     }
00217 
00219     // Library specific
00221 
00222     //
00223     // init V792 board data
00224     TRACE(  " Initializing QTP board data ... ");
00225     if ( !cvt_V792_open( &board_data, user_setting.m_base_address, vme_handle, user_setting.m_qtp_type)) {
00226         TRACE( "\nError executing cvt_V792_open \n");
00227         ret_val= -4;
00228         goto exit_point;
00229     }
00230     TRACE(  " Ok \n");
00231 
00232     //
00233     // Get system informations
00234     {
00235         UINT16 firmware_rev;
00236         UINT8  piggy_back_type;
00237         UINT16 serial_number;
00238 
00239         TRACE(  " Getting system informations ... ");
00240         if ( !cvt_V792_get_system_info( &board_data, &firmware_rev, &piggy_back_type, &serial_number)) {
00241             TRACE( "\nError executing cvt_V792_get_system_info \n");
00242             ret_val= -5;
00243             goto exit_point;
00244         }
00245         TRACE(  " Ok \n\n");
00246 
00247         // Show system infos
00248         TRACE1( "   Firmware Rev.       : %04x\n", firmware_rev);
00249         TRACE1( "   Piggy back type     : %s\n", cvt_V792_get_piggy_back_str( &board_data, piggy_back_type));
00250         TRACE1( "   Serial Number       : %04x\n", serial_number);
00251         TRACE(  "\n");
00252     }
00253     //
00254     // data clear
00255     TRACE(  " Sending data clear ... ");
00256     if ( !cvt_V792_data_clear( &board_data)) {
00257         TRACE( "\nError executing cvt_V792_data_clear \n");
00258         ret_val= -5;
00259         goto exit_point;
00260     }
00261     TRACE(  " Ok \n");
00262 
00263     //
00264     // Sliding constant
00265     TRACE(  " Setting sliding constant... ");
00266     if ( !cvt_V792_set_sliding_scale( &board_data,
00267                                       user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_sliding_scale_enable)) {
00268         TRACE( "Error executing cvt_V792_set_sliding_scale\n");
00269         ret_val= -5;
00270         goto exit_point;
00271     }
00272     TRACE(  " Ok\n");
00273 
00274     //
00275     // Zero suppression
00276     TRACE(  " Setting zero suppression... ");
00277         switch( board_data.m_type) {
00278                 case CVT_V965:
00279                 case CVT_V965_TYPE_A:
00280                 case CVT_V1785:
00281                         // Dual range board
00282                         if ( !cvt_V792_set_dual_range_zero_suppression( &board_data,
00283                                                                                                 user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_zero_suppression_enable,
00284                                                                                                 user_setting.m_zero_suppression_param.m_step_threshold,
00285                                                                                                 &user_setting.m_zero_suppression_param.m_high_thresholds_buff[0],
00286                                                                                                 &user_setting.m_zero_suppression_param.m_thresholds_buff[0])) {
00287                                 TRACE( "Error executing cvt_V792_set_dual_range_zero_suppression\n");
00288                                 ret_val= -5;
00289                                 goto exit_point;
00290                         }
00291                         break;
00292                 default:
00293                         if ( !cvt_V792_set_zero_suppression( &board_data,
00294                                                                                                 user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_zero_suppression_enable,
00295                                                                                                 user_setting.m_zero_suppression_param.m_step_threshold,
00296                                                                                                 &user_setting.m_zero_suppression_param.m_thresholds_buff[0])) {
00297                                 TRACE( "Error executing cvt_V792_set_zero_suppression\n");
00298                                 ret_val= -5;
00299                                 goto exit_point;
00300                         }
00301                         break;
00302         }
00303     TRACE(  " Ok\n");
00304 
00305     //
00306     // Acquisition mode
00307     TRACE(  " Setting acquisition mode ... ");
00308     if ( !cvt_V792_set_acquisition_mode( &board_data,
00309                                          user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_sliding_scale_enable,
00310                                          user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_zero_suppression_enable,
00311                                          user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_overflow_suppression_enable,
00312                                          user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_valid_suppression_enable,
00313                                          user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_common_stop_enable,
00314                                          user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_empty_enable,
00315                                          user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_count_all_events
00316                                        )) {
00317         TRACE( "Error executing cvt_V792_set_continuous_acquisition_mode \n");
00318         ret_val= -5;
00319         goto exit_point;
00320     }
00321     TRACE(  " Ok\n");
00322 
00323     //
00324     // readout mode
00325     TRACE(  " Setting readout mode ...");
00326     if ( !cvt_V792_set_readout_mode( &board_data, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE)) {
00327         TRACE( "Error executing cvt_V792_set_readout_mode \n");
00328         ret_val= -5;
00329         goto exit_point;
00330     }
00331     TRACE(  " Ok\n");
00332 
00333     // Allocate buffer storage
00334     data_buff= malloc( DATA_BUFF_SIZE);
00335     if ( data_buff== NULL) {
00336         // Insufficient memory
00337         TRACE1( "Error allocating events' buffer (%i bytes)", DATA_BUFF_SIZE);
00338         ret_val= -5;
00339         goto exit_point;
00340     }
00341     // Allocate histogram storage
00342     {
00343         int i;
00344         for ( i= 0; i< MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS; i++) {
00345             histo_buff[ i]= malloc( MAX_HISTO_SAMPLES* sizeof( *histo_buff[i]));
00346             if ( histo_buff[ i]== NULL) {
00347                 // Insufficient memory
00348                 TRACE1( "Error allocating histogram' buffer (%li bytes)", (long)( MAX_HISTO_SAMPLES* sizeof( *histo_buff[i])));
00349                 ret_val= -5;
00350                 goto exit_point;
00351             }
00352             memset( histo_buff[i], 0, MAX_HISTO_SAMPLES* sizeof( *histo_buff[i]));
00353         }
00354     }
00355     if ( strlen( user_setting.m_parsed_output_filename)) {
00356         // Create output files
00357         if ( ( parsed_out_file= fopen( user_setting.m_parsed_output_filename, "wt"))== NULL) {
00358             TRACE1( "Error creating parsed output file '%s'", user_setting.m_parsed_output_filename);
00359             ret_val= -5;
00360             goto exit_point;
00361         }
00362     }
00363     if ( strlen( user_setting.m_raw_output_filename)) {
00364         if ( ( raw_out_file= fopen( user_setting.m_raw_output_filename, "w+b"))== NULL) {
00365             TRACE1( "Error creating raw output file '%s' \n", user_setting.m_raw_output_filename);
00366             ret_val= -5;
00367             goto exit_point;
00368         }
00369     }
00370 
00371     //
00372     // Start acquisition
00373     TRACE( "\n");
00374     TRACE( "\nHit 's' to start acquisition , any other to quit ...\n");
00375     switch ( getch()) {
00376     case 's':
00377     case 'S':
00378         break;
00379     default:
00380         ret_val= -4;
00381         goto exit_point;
00382     }
00383     // open gnuplot for the first time
00384     {
00385         char *gnu_plot_filename= (char*)malloc( MAX_FILENAME_LENGHT);
00386         sprintf( gnu_plot_filename, "%s%s", user_setting.m_gnu_plot_path, GNUPLOT_COMMAND);
00387 
00388         // open the pipe
00389         if (( gnu_plot_pipe = popen( gnu_plot_filename, "w"))== NULL) {
00390             TRACE( "N957 GNU Plot pipe creation failure");
00391             ret_val= -3;
00392             free( gnu_plot_filename);
00393             goto exit_point;
00394         }
00395 
00397         //fprintf( gnu_plot_pipe, "ch = %d; mod = %d; unit = %d; sens = %f\n", ChSel, ModSel, Unit, Sensitivity);
00398         free( gnu_plot_filename);
00399     }
00400 
00401     // gnu plot commands
00402     strcpy( aux_string, "load 'plot_histo.cfg'\n");
00403     if ( fwrite( aux_string, 1, strlen( aux_string), gnu_plot_pipe)!= strlen( aux_string)) {
00404         // out file write error
00405         TRACE( "\n Pipe write failure\n");
00406         ret_val= -3;
00407         goto exit_point;
00408     }
00409 
00410     TRACE( "\nAcquisition running ...\n");
00411     TRACE( "\nHit 'r' to reset histogram");
00412     TRACE( "\nHit 'p' to pause/resume");
00413     TRACE( "\nHit 'c' to select the channel to plot");
00414     TRACE( "\nAny other to quit ...");
00415     TRACE( "\n");
00416 
00417     while(( read_events< user_setting.m_num_events)|| (user_setting.m_num_events<= 0)) {
00418         //static long last_read_bytes= 0;
00419         //static long read_bytes= 0;
00420         data_size= DATA_BUFF_SIZE;
00421         while ( paused) {
00422             if ( kbhit()) {
00423                 switch ( getch()) {
00424                 case 'r':
00425                 case 'R': {
00426                     // reset the histogram here
00427                     int i;
00428                     for ( i= 0; i< MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS; i++) {
00429                         memset( histo_buff[i], 0, MAX_HISTO_SAMPLES* sizeof( *histo_buff[i]));
00430                     }
00431                 }
00432                 break;
00433                 case 'p':
00434                 case 'P':
00435                     paused= !paused;
00436                     break;
00437                 case 'c':
00438                 case 'C':
00439                     act_channel= channel_select( act_channel);
00440                     break;
00441                 default:
00442                     ret_val= 0;
00443                     goto exit_point;
00444                 }
00445             }
00446             Sleep( 1);
00447         }
00448 
00449         //
00450         // Read from MEB .....
00451         if ( !cvt_V792_read_MEB( &board_data, data_buff, &data_size)) {
00452             TRACE( " \nError executing cvt_V792_read_MEB \n");
00453             ret_val= -5;
00454             goto exit_point;
00455         }
00456 
00457         //
00458         // .... and store raw data into file (if enabled)
00459         if ( raw_out_file) {
00460             if ( fwrite( data_buff, 1, data_size, raw_out_file)!= data_size) {
00461                 TRACE( " \nError writing raw data file \n");
00462                 ret_val= -5;
00463                 goto exit_point;
00464             }
00465         }
00466 
00467         //read_bytes+= data_size;
00468         //if( ( read_bytes>> 10)!= ( last_read_bytes>> 10))
00469         //{
00470         //      //
00471         //      // Give user a feedback every 1KB data
00472         //      TRACE( ".");
00473         //}
00474         //last_read_bytes= read_bytes;
00475         // Process the data
00476         {
00477             UINT32 *tmp_buff= (UINT32*)data_buff;
00478             char line[ 400];
00479             size_t str_len;
00480 
00481             while (((long)(data_size-=4) >= 0)&&
00482                     (( read_events< user_setting.m_num_events)|| (user_setting.m_num_events<= 0))) {
00483                 UINT32 data= *(tmp_buff++);
00484                 *line= '\0';
00485 
00486                 if ( kbhit()) {
00487                     switch ( getch()) {
00488                     case 'r':
00489                     case 'R': 
00490                                                 {
00491                                                         // reset the histogram here
00492                                                         int i;
00493                                                         for ( i= 0; i< MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS; i++) {
00494                                                                 memset( histo_buff[i], 0, MAX_HISTO_SAMPLES* sizeof( *histo_buff[i]));
00495                                                         }
00496                                                 }
00497                                                 break;
00498                     case 'p':
00499                     case 'P':
00500                         paused= !paused;
00501                         break;
00502                     case 'c':
00503                     case 'C':
00504                         act_channel= channel_select( act_channel);
00505                         break;
00506                     default:
00507                         ret_val= 0;
00508                         goto exit_point;
00509                     }
00510                 }
00511 
00512                 switch ( data& CVT_QTP_DATA_TYPE_MSK) {
00513                 case CVT_QTP_HEADER: 
00514                                         {
00515                                                 // header
00516                                                 UINT32 geo= CVT_QTP_GET_HDR_GEO( data);
00517                                                 UINT32 crate= CVT_QTP_GET_HDR_CRATE( data);
00518                                                 UINT32 ch_count= CVT_QTP_GET_HDR_CH_COUNT( data);
00519 
00520                                                 sprintf( line, HDR_STR, geo, crate, ch_count);
00521                                         }
00522                                         break;
00523                 case CVT_QTP_EOB: 
00524                                         {
00525                                                 // EOB
00526                                                 UINT32 geo= CVT_QTP_GET_EOB_GEO( data);
00527                                                 UINT32 event_count= CVT_QTP_GET_EOB_EVENT_COUNT( data);
00528 
00529                                                 sprintf( line, EOB_STR, geo, event_count);
00530 
00531                                                 ++read_events;
00532                         }
00533                             break;
00534                 case CVT_QTP_DATUM: 
00535                                         {
00536                                                 // DATUM
00537                                                 UINT32 geo= CVT_V792_GET_DATUM_GEO( data);
00538                                                 UINT32 ch= 0;
00539                                                 UINT32 adc= CVT_V792_GET_DATUM_ADC( data);
00540                                                 UINT32 un= CVT_V792_GET_DATUM_UN( data);
00541                                                 UINT32 ov= CVT_V792_GET_DATUM_OV( data);
00542 
00543                                                 switch ( user_setting.m_qtp_type) {
00544                                                 case CVT_V792_TYPE_A:
00545                                                         ch= CVT_V792A_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00546                                                         break;
00547                                                 case CVT_V792_TYPE_N:
00548                                                         ch= CVT_V792N_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00549                                                         break;
00550                                                 case CVT_V965:
00551                                                         ch= CVT_V965_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00552                                                         break;
00553                                                 case CVT_V965_TYPE_A:
00554                                                         ch= CVT_V965A_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00555                                                         break;
00556                                                 case CVT_V785_TYPE_A:
00557                                                         ch= CVT_V785A_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00558                                                         break;
00559                                                 case CVT_V785_TYPE_N:
00560                                                         ch= CVT_V785N_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00561                                                         break;
00562                                                 case CVT_V1785:
00563                                                         ch= CVT_V1785_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00564                                                         break;
00565                                                 case CVT_V775_TYPE_A:
00566                                                         ch= CVT_V775A_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00567                                                         break;
00568                                                 case CVT_V775_TYPE_N:
00569                                                         ch= CVT_V775N_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00570                                                         break;
00571                                                 default:
00572                                                         // Unmatched case !??!
00573                                                         ret_val= -5;
00574                                                         goto exit_point;
00575                                                 }
00576                                                 // Histogram update
00577                                                 // sanity checks
00578                                                 if ( ch< sizeof( histo_buff)/sizeof( histo_buff[0])) {
00579                                                         ++histo_buff[ ch][ adc& (MAX_HISTO_SAMPLES- 1)];
00580                                                 }
00581                                                 sprintf( line, DATUM_STR, geo, ch, adc, un, ov);
00582                                         }
00583                                         break;
00584                 case CVT_QTP_NOT_VALID_DATUM: 
00585                     // NOT VALID DATUM
00586                     sprintf( line, NOT_VALID_DATUM_STR);
00587                                         break;
00588                                 default: 
00589                     // UNKNOWM data type !!?!
00590                     // sprintf( line, UNKNOWN_STR, data);
00591                                         break;
00592                 }
00593                 if ( (str_len= strlen( line))> 0) {
00594                     if ( parsed_out_file) {
00595                         if ( fwrite( line, 1, str_len, parsed_out_file)!= str_len) {
00596                             // error writing file
00597                             TRACE1( "\nError writing parsed output file '%s' \n", user_setting.m_parsed_output_filename);
00598                             ret_val= -5;
00599                             goto exit_point;
00600                         }
00601                     }
00602                 }
00603             }
00604         }
00605         if ( get_time()>= next_refresh) {
00606             int sample;
00607             FILE* histo_file= NULL;
00608 
00609             next_refresh= get_time()+ user_setting.m_gnu_plot_refresh;
00610             if (( histo_file= fopen( HISTO_FILENAME, "wt"))== NULL) {
00611                 // out file write error
00612                 TRACE1( "\nHistogramn output file creation failure '%s'", HISTO_FILENAME);
00613                 ret_val= -3;
00614                 goto exit_point;
00615             }
00616 
00617             // Save data to histogram file
00618             for ( sample= 0; sample< MAX_HISTO_SAMPLES; sample++) {
00619                 // Check for user commands
00620                 if ( kbhit()) {
00621                     switch ( getch()) {
00622                     case 'r':
00623                     case 'R': 
00624                                                 {
00625                                                         // reset the histogram here
00626                                                         int i;
00627                                                         for ( i= 0; i< MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS; i++) {
00628                                                                 memset( histo_buff[i], 0, MAX_HISTO_SAMPLES* sizeof( *histo_buff[i]));
00629                                                         }
00630                                                 }
00631                             break;
00632                     case 'p':
00633                     case 'P':
00634                         paused= !paused;
00635                         break;
00636                     case 'c':
00637                     case 'C':
00638                         act_channel= channel_select( act_channel);
00639                         break;
00640                     default:
00641                         ret_val= 0;
00642                         goto exit_point;
00643                     }
00644                 }
00645                 sprintf( aux_string, "%ld\n", histo_buff[ act_channel][ sample]);
00646                 //sprintf( aux_string, "%f\t%ld\n", (float)i* user_setting.m_gnu_plot_x_scale, histo_buff[ i]);
00647                 if ( fwrite( aux_string, 1, strlen( aux_string), histo_file)!= strlen( aux_string)) {
00648                     // out file write error
00649                     TRACE( "\n Histogram file write failure\n");
00650                     ret_val= -3;
00651                     goto exit_point;
00652                 }
00653             }
00654             fclose( histo_file);
00655 
00656             // write to gnuplot
00657             strcpy( aux_string, "plot 'histo.dat' with histogram 2\n");
00658             // strcpy( aux_string, "set style histogram rows\n plot 'histo.dat' using 2, '' using 4, '' using 6:xticlabels(1)\n");
00659             if ( fwrite( aux_string, 1, strlen( aux_string), gnu_plot_pipe)!= strlen( aux_string)) {
00660                 // out file write error
00661                 TRACE( "\n Pipe write failure\n");
00662                 ret_val= -3;
00663                 goto exit_point;
00664             }
00665             fflush( gnu_plot_pipe);
00666             Sleep( 1);
00667         }
00668     }
00669     TRACE(  "\n Done \n");
00670 
00671 exit_point:
00673     // Library specific
00675 
00676     //
00677     // Release board resources
00678     if ( !cvt_V792_close( &board_data)) {
00679         TRACE( "\nError executing cvt_V792_close\n");
00680     }
00681 
00683     // Demo application specific
00685 
00686     if ( gnu_plot_pipe!= NULL) {
00687         fprintf( gnu_plot_pipe, "exit\n");
00688         pclose( gnu_plot_pipe);
00689     }
00690 
00691     if ( raw_out_file!= NULL) {
00692         fclose( raw_out_file);
00693     }
00694     if ( parsed_out_file!= NULL) {
00695         fclose( parsed_out_file);
00696     }
00697     if ( data_buff!= NULL) {
00698         free( data_buff);
00699     }
00700     {
00701         int i;
00702         for ( i= 0; i< MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS; i++) {
00703             if ( histo_buff[ i])
00704                 free( histo_buff[ i]);
00705         }
00706     }
00707 
00708     // close modules
00709     user_settings_close( &user_setting);
00710 
00711     TRACE( "Hit a key to exit ...");
00712     getch();
00713 
00714     return ret_val;
00715 }
